title: Rusting world = Declin
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Margaret Pettigrew and Laurent Coderre
brief_description: The scene is a desolate landscape which reveals no signs of life. Out of the stillness emerge two opposing factions, both wanting possession of a shiny object. This allegorical film suggests a decaying world created by greed, but the ultimate interpretation rests with the viewer.
